I think the opening of the capital markets window in the United States is real, Sergio Marchionne said. "I think it would be unwise for Chrysler not to take advantage of the opening." months tells NRO the conservative Hoosier "was extremely torn while he deliberated." Another who met with Mike Pence feels his heart was never completely in a bid for president. Someone close to Mike Pence explains that the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from Indiana, wanted to see him come back to Indiana. By contrast, "the support for him to run nationally was in large part from leaders of the national conservative movement"- who perhaps didn't have the same sway as his longtime supporters.
